
## BASE:   basic data.frame operations
-   subset
-   aggregate
-   with
-   transform

## subset rows
```{r}
df  <-  mtcars
df |>
    subset(hp > 200)
```

## select columns
```{r}
df[, c("mpg", "cyl")]
```
```

base::transform
  -   allows unquoted operations on column in data.frame
  -   adds new column
```{r}
transform(mtcars, twice = hp * 2) |> head(n=3)
```
